privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.subtitle: We minimize data collection and protect contributors.

scope.title: Scope
scope.body: This policy explains how Gard-e Javidan handles data on this platform.

collection.title: Data we collect
collection.body: We collect only what is necessary to keep the platform safe and functional.
items: Anonymous session identifiers derived from browser fingerprints
Hashed network data for abuse prevention (no raw IPs stored)
User-supplied content and evidence you choose to submit

cookies.title: Cookies and tracking
cookies.body: We do not use advertising trackers. Minimal storage is used to remember your session and language preference.

storage.title: Data storage
storage.body: Records are stored with full history for accountability. We never delete records; changes are preserved as versions.

security.title: Security
security.body: We use encryption in transit and rate limiting to protect the platform. No personal accounts or emails are required.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: If you have privacy concerns, contact us at the email listed in the footer.

terms.title: Terms of service
terms.subtitle: Guidelines for using the platform responsibly.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.body: Gard-e Javidan exists to document public records with verification and transparency.

conduct.title: Contributor responsibilities
conduct.body: By submitting content you agree to follow these rules:
items: Do not share personal identifying information about contributors
Avoid harassment, hate speech, or incitement
Respect the verification workflow and community review

verification.title: Verification workflow
verification.body: Updates require multiple confirmations before becoming official. The platform preserves historical versions.

removal.title: Content moderation
removal.body: We may restrict content that violates safety or legal obligations, while preserving audit trails.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body: Content is provided by contributors. Gard-e Javidan does not guarantee completeness or accuracy.

changes.title: Changes to these terms
changes.body: We may update these terms to protect the community. Continued use means acceptance of updates.

guide.title: Platform guide
guide.subtitle: What this platform is for and how to contribute safely.

mission.title: Mission
mission.body: Gard-e Javidan is a public accountability archive focused on verified records and historical preservation.

how.title: How it works
how.body: Anyone can submit new records. Updates require community verification.
items: Create a record with evidence and clear context
Propose updates if details change or improve
Verify updates to help the most accurate version become official

verification.title: Verification
verification.body: Updates are reviewed and confirmed by multiple independent sessions before becoming current.

anonymity.title: Anonymity
anonymity.body: No accounts or emails. We rely on anonymous sessions and minimal metadata to reduce risk.

what.title: What to submit
what.body: Focus on verifiable facts and supporting evidence.
items: Dates and locations tied to incidents
Sources, media, or witness accounts when available

safety.title: Safety
safety.body: Avoid sharing personal identifying information about contributors. Use this platform responsibly.
